entry.title: Toggling desklamps via twitter with Python at NTW (Part 1)
entry.summary: This is a story about Electrical Extension Cords that run python, feature WiFi and allow toggling outlets via tweets!
entry.content:
,

Few days ago, at work, our head of engineering tasked us to come up with content for a workshop at Nairobi Tech Week where we would demo some mob programming methodologies.

So we decided to "adapt" a previous micropython presentation I gave where we demo'd how to turn desklamps (plugged into a "modified" extension) on and off using python. and have the attendees devided into mob program

Thus, for our hardware:- - The brains behind esp8266 (flashed with uPy), afew relays and one 6-port electrical extension

But this time since the crowd wou, (easier to) package into the extension's housing

BOM:- - SSRs
